SHAME!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1557983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1557983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1555903" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1555903" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cinnamontopography"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1497279.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cinnamontopography" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1555903ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1555903" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497279">cinnamontopography</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-03">05/03/22 01:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thoroughly enjoyed this at the initial spray. A bright and sweet blend of caramely goodness, but not sweet enough to make you sick. After approx. 2 hours it started to smell a bit odd, perhaps it's just my chemistry, but the sweetness dies down to reveal something heavy and sharp that gets fainter by the minute. Not up to my liking. Really wish the initial sweetness lasted longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1555903"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1555903#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1554209" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jessbrooke2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275869"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jessbrooke2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1554209ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1554209" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1275869">Jessbrooke2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-30">04/30/22 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay oddly enough this scent was nostalgic for me and smelt like BBW winter candy apple fragrance. They don’t even share the same notes and I barely get caramel out of this. It smells gourmand and fruity to me. Pretty but kinda cheap smelling</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1554209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1554209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1552048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1552048" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Honeysuckle85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196267"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1196267.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Honeysuckle85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1552048ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1552048" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196267">Honeysuckle85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-27">04/27/22 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful fragrance. The blend between the caramel and vanilla mixed with salt and cardamom is truly a dream. So fine and elegant, the caramel is so soft.. wow</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1552048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1552048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1551005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1551005" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Controlledbyscent31"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369758.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Controlledbyscent31" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Asdaaf/Ameerat-Al-Arab-Prive-Rose-81967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ameerat Al Arab Prive Rose "title="Ameerat Al Arab Prive Rose "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1551005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1551005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758">Controlledbyscent31</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-26">04/26/22 03:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really liked this definately get the lira vanilla simularity in this but for the price longevity and projection are just awful on my skin! <br />
so as much as I like it I won't pay this price for one unless it was considerably discounted.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1551005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1551005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1529677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1529677" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Landshark7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1300080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1300080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Landshark7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1529677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1529677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1300080">Landshark7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-24">03/24/22 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>if anyone's selling a partial in the UK pm me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1529677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1529677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1525632" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SailorV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.955817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SailorV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1525632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1525632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817">SailorV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-18">03/18/22 07:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A stunning grown-up caramel gourmand dream! It actually smells so well-blended that the notes are hard to single out when you don't look at the list, it just smells so warm, spicy and beautiful. But when you read the notes it all makes sense: An ultra creamy, milky salt caramel note with absolutely no hints of the burnt, crunchy tones other caramels have, with cashmeran blended in to amp the creaminess further up. Vanilla adds even more coziness, but it doesn't turn cloying. The spicy notes of cardamom and pimento are a great choice. The cardamom is dry and warm and smells just like it does in Swedish pastries, while the pimento is really hot and spicy, especially in the opening. A little bit like a ginger note, but even more fiery. It's uncommon to get this sensation from perfumes and I love it. <br />
I don't really smell tobacco here though, instead I get some booziness in the opening and a slight woodsy vibe behind the spiced gourmand goodness. <br />
To me this is strictly a fall/winter scent. It's warming, cozy and sexy, feminine and sweet without being overly girly. <br />
<br />
Admittedly I ignored Penhaligons for a long time because the traditional "old English" image is a little bland to me, I just never found it appealing. If you think like this, please go out and try Constance (or whatever sounds good to you from the Portraits collection), they're not boring at all and very well-made.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1525632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1525632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1522839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1522839" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="*loves_shoes*"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407258.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="*loves_shoes*" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1522839ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1522839" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407258">*loves_shoes*</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-14">03/14/22 01:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is gorgeous. It has the same caramel-vanilla style note as Lira, Musc Ravageur, and Roaring Radcliffe also by Penhaligons. Not that it smells the same as those, it’s just that note. This is spicier and doesn’t have the boozy feel of Roaring Radcliffe, or the aromatic feel of Ani. And it’s nowhere near as sweet as Lira or even Musc Ravageur. <br />
It’s just delicious. <br />
Sadly, after 8 sprays on my skin and 3 sprays on my dress, 30 mins ago, I’m sat here and can’t really smell it. Just a vague waft now and then. I thought 11 sprays was over spraying but apparently I need more to smell this without putting my nose to my skin!<br />
<br />
Edit: it’s now been on an hour and a half and I’ve been in a warm room for the last half hour, and I can now smell it. This one needs to warm up to project. Much happier with it now.<br />
<br />
Edit: I just tested positive for covid the night after writing this, and have now just about lost my smell altogether, so I’m not sure how accurate this is, I’ll update if my smell comes back…!<br />
<br />
Edit again - my smell is back. And this is still gorgeous. And still doesn’t least on skin, it’s a bit better on clothes but it’s a shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1522839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1522839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1521619" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1521619" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweetvanis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1400346"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1400346.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweetvanis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Couvent-Maison-de-Parfum/Cologne-of-the-Missions-18811.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18811.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cologne of the Missions"title="Cologne of the Missions"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1521619ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1521619" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1400346">Sweetvanis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-12">03/12/22 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Would be nice on grandpa, smells like sweet tobacco</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1521619"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1521619#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1517885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1517885" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eaudesillage"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1264723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eaudesillage" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Blue-Madeleine-92071.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92071.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blue Madeleine"title="Blue Madeleine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1517885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1517885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264723">eaudesillage</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-06">03/06/22 15:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A successful blind buy for me. I know, so risky considering the price. But I knew I like cardamom in gourmand fragrance and owning Lune Feline makes me realize that. Changing Constantce is a surprisingly not loud spiced sweet gourmand perfume. Cardamom hits you first and foremost but then it mellows down to a soft and your-skin-but-better scent. I also notice wearing it in a 80 degrees Hawaii weather turns up the sweetness a little bit. A must have and a great one in the Penhaligon's collection. Next I must try Bewitching Yasmine!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1517885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1517885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1515845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1515845" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Riannevanderlaann"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1306188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Riannevanderlaann" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Starlight-58246.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58246.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Starlight"title="Starlight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1515845ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1515845" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306188">Riannevanderlaann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-03">03/03/22 12:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm obsessed with this perfume. I love the bottle and the scent is divine. It's a gorgeous boozy, spicy, caramel and vanilla fragrance. The longevity isn't the best, but I overspray and reapply throughout the day because I just can't get enough of this scent. Definitely one of my favorites for winter, if not my favorite. <br />
Instagram: @olfactolove__</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1515845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1515845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1512547" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daisy_D"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daisy_D" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1512547ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1512547" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258353">Daisy_D</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-26">02/26/22 12:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another gourmand fragrance. Light caramel vanilla milk..Musky..One of the more unisex fragrance among the Penhaligon's Portraits,..,as some of them among the series are too masculine and some too feminine. Yet, this is young and with no threshold. It's not too bold nor too dramatic, which might be a good thing, as people could favour it for longer without easily getting tired of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1512547"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1512547#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1493609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1493609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natfran98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="natfran98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1493609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1493609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230919">natfran98</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-29">01/29/22 12:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such an unexpected love for me! Whenever me and my friends have gone perfume shopping we’ve always tested the Portraits Collection on paper and thought they all smelt, well, horrible. I’ve always been convinced that they’d be different on skin though, and I was right.<br />
Moment I sprayed this on my skin, I got the most gorgeous smooth sweet caramel. It filled the car and me and my boyfriend’s eyes practically rolled into the back of our heads. Up close, I was getting very very subtle cardamom and more of a sweet spice from the pimento. Tobacco undertone, not over the top at all. Same with the vanilla. Just a beautifully balanced scent. <br />
Then, we tried it on my boyfriend because we thought it would smell great on him too if it reacted the same way. But it didn’t. As from another earlier review, the spices on him were very overpowering initially. A LOT of cardamom came out on his skin with very little caramel. After about half an hour to an hour though the caramel did start to come out, and we liked it again. It still came out sweeter on me though. Fascinating how different skins can completely change a scent. It didn’t exactly surprise me though, because my skin cycles through fragrances an awful lot faster than my boyfriend’s, so top stages tend to last very well on him whereas they’re quite fleeting on me. <br />
Longevity is moderate, which is disappointing for the price. But my skin varies when it comes to longevity so I might have a more successful day another time. <br />
Love it. Might add to want list.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1493609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1493609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1482994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1482994" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aehimen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334745"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aehimen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1482994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1482994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334745">Aehimen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-14">01/14/22 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts off as a spicy caramel cinnamon biscuit then quickly powers down to a more mellow,  boozy vanilla with still a bit of spice. The spice at the onset is quite overpowering. Longevity is inexistent. Overall a nice cozy delicious christmas morning, indoors scent.<br />
<br />
Edit: I wore 9 hours ago and I still smell it! Forget what i said earlier, this has more longevity than most</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1482994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1482994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1481977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; They all smell more or less the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1481977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1481977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1480083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I've yet to smell lune or princess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1480083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1480083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1477117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1477117" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luluteeter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1436292.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luluteeter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1477117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1477117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436292">Luluteeter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-05">01/05/22 19:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely adore this fragrance. It’s warm spicy and a little sweet, and mellow, and just perfect. I actually detest strong cardamom and was terrified when I got this and was staring at the note breakdown (as you do) on this site and *really* could smell the cardamom, but the other notes blend so well, that I LOVE it now. The perfect fall/winter cozy fragrance. <br />
<br />
My only negative is that it does not seem to last very long at all on skin or clothes for me. But honestly I love it so much I’m ok with having to reapply.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1477117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1477117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1467687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1467687" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mayamaya80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mayamaya80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1467687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1467687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402168">mayamaya80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-21">12/21/21 05:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know what to make of this perfume. I can smell it for a few minutes then it becomes almost imperceptible. The initial blast was spicy ambery vanillic scent that was so lovely and I thought I finally found an almost gourmand fragrance I liked. Then it was gone. I almost had to dig my nose into my skin to get the smell. It's like I'm anosmic to the rest of the notes after the opening. I tried it several times using the sample I got from the Portraits Collection discovery set. It happens all the time. I have yet to ask people around me if they smell anything.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1467687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1467687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1456519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1456519" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1456519ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1456519" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); This one has is a bit more masculine, with cardamom taking over at some point. I would have loved to see the sweet notes develop further. Iget a light animalic whiff at the 4-hour mark and not a trace of tobacco.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1456519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1456519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1452262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1452262" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ohmyitsabbey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ohmyitsabbey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Intense-Cafe-18021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Cafe"title="Intense Cafe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1452262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1452262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1391341">ohmyitsabbey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-25">11/25/21 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I spritzed this on in Heathrow duty-free today and fell in love!! Then, after I had it on for a while, I realized why I like it so much—it smells like Cloud 2.0 on me. A little richer and deeper, but still like 90% the same. On my grad school budget, I’m just glad to have a cheapie that will remind me of this lovely bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1452262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1452262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1443312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1443312" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ravenna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360311"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360311.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ravenna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1443312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1443312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360311">ravenna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-10">11/10/21 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This starts off with a warm, caramel sweetness that's not overpowering, and then the vanilla and lightly spiced chai come through. Gorgeous, easy to wear gourmand but a little uninteresting? If you have something like this in your collection you definitely don't need Constance- I layer this with Lune Feline for a more complex, intricate gourmand (I don't find LF to be a gourmand but they work great together). <br />
<br />
It's a lovely scent on its own but I get sick of it quickly- it's sweet without much depth and I don't pick up any tobacco.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1443312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1443312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1442855" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can only compare it with what i have in my collection or smelled and to me changing constance opens very spicy due to the pimento and cardamom notes and it dries down somehow like Princess by Kilian only more unisex, more caramely and less marshmallow. It stays very close to the skin unfortunately and the lasting power is not great either but the smell is so enchanting that I could justify buying a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1432676" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cocofluff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141155"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1141155.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cocofluff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Bendelirious-4511.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4511.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bendelirious"title="Bendelirious"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1432676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1432676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); Creamy, delicious vanilla caramel mid. <br />
This is way better than I expected. Glad I sampled.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1432676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1432676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1432294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1432294" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1432294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1432294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-21">10/21/21 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lune Féline’s younger sister. More rounded, sweeter cardamom with smoked caramel instead of burning fir cardamom. On my skin, the caramel is deep and musky. This musk is quite alluring and I don’t know if it’s my nose, but it smells like a dirty musk.<br />
<br />
A beautiful composition of notes that opens with a punch of cardamom with a side of pimento. Quickly followed by a delicious salted caramel. Unfortunately, the trail of smoked caramel doesn’t last too long. So unfortunate for such an expensive fragrance. However, it’s far too beautiful to miss out on. Sign me up for a bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1432294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1432294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1423740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1423740" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentFan2021"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383423"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentFan2021" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Prive-Rouge-Malachite-34589.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34589.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Prive Rouge Malachite"title="Armani Prive Rouge Malachite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1423740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1423740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383423">ScentFan2021</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-06">10/06/21 22:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful fragrance. It's a little mystifying because sometimes it comes out with a little spice/kick to it; other times, it doesn't. But it smells beautiful regardless. To the reviewer who sampled it, but did not smell anything: I am curious, did you sample it in a dab/vial container, or with a small sprayer?  When I used a dab vial, I also did not smell much of anything. But after I transferred it to a small atomizer I had, the spray was...WONDERFUL.  😍 <br />
<br />
It only lasts 4-5 hours on me, and by that 5th hour it is almost gone. But, you can smell like smoked caramel for at least 3 hours before re-spraying and it's great! The bottle is fun, too, especially if you have rustic decor. 😊</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1423740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1423740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1418250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1418250" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="laurenannika"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="laurenannika" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1418250ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1418250" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); Not even a little bit. I’m glad I sampled it first as the notes looked so convincing I almost bind bought it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1418250"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1418250#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1408311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1408311" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chandanlove02"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chandanlove02" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boucheron/Santal-de-Kandy-49094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal de Kandy"title="Santal de Kandy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1408311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1408311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204936">chandanlove02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-11">09/11/21 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An absolutely beautiful fragrance. Delicious cardamom which is my favourite spice note in perfumes, blended with the most gooey salted caramel. The salt isn't sharp here but just enough to add that special yumminess to the fragrance. This concoction lasts for a good 6 hours after which the vanilla starts peeking through. The drydown has that sweet vanilla but the cardamom is there too, albeit extremely light. I walk around in this yummy bubble of gourmand goodness- a little sweet, a little savory. Its divine. It smells special, warm and comforting. All weather perfume. It's beautiful even for cool summer nights. Not cloying at all. Its compared to Prada Candy but that's a straight up sweet perfume. It doesn't have the complexities of Changing Constance. It does not smell like Kilian Princess. Its unique, its happiness in a bottle and it's a big love for me ❤️</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1408311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1408311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1394148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371926">Beautscnt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-17">08/17/21 18:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my goodness! Talk about a DUD! <br />
Did the whole nighttime shower routine, moisturized with whipped butter &amp; jojoba oil. Then sprayed while skin was damp… did not last an hour! I even forgot I sprayed it on till I walked back to the dresser to apply perfume cause I thought I forgot to?! <br />
Had it been another perfume, I would be smelling it in bed till morning.<br />
<br />
Absolutely NOT worth the high mark-up. It really should be going for $15 at most (for the price of the bottle &amp; the headpiece cap but not for the juice) <br />
I’ve had $5 body sprays last longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1394148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1394148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1390023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1335359">Chelsey325</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-26">07/26/21 16:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful, cozy, creamy scent. I love it! However, it sits very close to the skin. So much so that I can only smell it if I put my wrist to my nose. Poor projection, and lasts about 3-4 hours. Too expensive for so/so performance, but a beautiful scent none the less. I have Princess by Kilian and am currently wearing both on each arm. Almost IDENTICAL.<br />
<br />
Edit: Changing Constance becomes slightly spicier on the dry down than Princess. Still very close</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1381909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1381909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1369877" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
