padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224809">Advaitaforever</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-03">07/03/21 01:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clotted cream fudge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1369877"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1369877#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1366317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1366317" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1366317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1366317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-26">06/26/21 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cheap salted caramel synthetic scent. Really don't like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1366317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1366317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="50256" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1298731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1298731" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alex6863"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1147080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1147080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alex6863" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Sensuous-2938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensuous"title="Sensuous"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1298731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1298731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1147080">alex6863</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-25">02/25/21 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initial thought upon first spray: Lune Feline. Changing Constance opens with a burst of cardamum, much like Lune Feline. Where they differ is the dry down, where Changing Constance has a slight salty caramel note. However, they are very, very similar.   <br />
<br />
On my skin, the cardamum is the most prominent note in Changing Constance. It’s beautifully supported by vanilla and caramel, and has a nice mellow powdery-ness to it. It’s a very beautiful and rich gourmand. I don’t personally get any pimento or tobacco from this, but I’m starting to think my skin just eats tobacco notes.   <br />
<br />
I’ll have to respectfully disagree with former reviews who liken this to perfumes such as Flowerbomb and La Vie Est Belle. Aside from not having any cardamum, Flowerbomb (which was my teenage signature scent) is much screechier. They don’t smell alike to me at all. La Vie Est Belle is a very girly and fruity gourmand that I personally don’t care for, but Changing Constance I love. It’s much more mellow and comforting, something I’d wear while snuggling on the couch, not while going out and acting questionable.<br />
<br />
I cannot imagine anyone who loves Lune Feline not also loving this. That being said, I don’t think anyone would need to own both. I personally prefer Lune Feline slightly more, since it’s a touch spicier and has better longevity. However, I’d be just as thrilled to own Changing Constance. If you love gourmands, especially those containing cardamum, this is a really beautiful one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1298731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1298731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1386071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1386071" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="klrobe002"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="klrobe002" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1386071ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1386071" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360991">klrobe002</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-03">08/03/21 16:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As many others have said, its a beautiful fragrance that has the lasting power of a Demeter fragrance. So, so disappointing for the price. But to be honest, I dont think I would buy it even if it were the price of demeter too, as I hate perfumes that dont last.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1386071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1386071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1408311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1408311" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chandanlove02"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1204936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chandanlove02" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boucheron/Santal-de-Kandy-49094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal de Kandy"title="Santal de Kandy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1408311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1408311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204936">chandanlove02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-11">09/11/21 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An absolutely beautiful fragrance. Delicious cardamom which is my favourite spice note in perfumes, blended with the most gooey salted caramel. The salt isn't sharp here but just enough to add that special yumminess to the fragrance. This concoction lasts for a good 6 hours after which the vanilla starts peeking through. The drydown has that sweet vanilla but the cardamom is there too, albeit extremely light. I walk around in this yummy bubble of gourmand goodness- a little sweet, a little savory. Its divine. It smells special, warm and comforting. All weather perfume. It's beautiful even for cool summer nights. Not cloying at all. Its compared to Prada Candy but that's a straight up sweet perfume. It doesn't have the complexities of Changing Constance. It does not smell like Kilian Princess. Its unique, its happiness in a bottle and it's a big love for me ❤️</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1408311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1408311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1436225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1436225" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liz-frag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1288374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liz-frag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-des-Ors/Lune-Feline-29716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lune Feline"title="Lune Feline"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1436225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1436225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1288374">Liz-frag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-28">10/28/21 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is ridiculously stunning! It’s smell so yummy and mysterious and enchanting 😍 <br />
But god I have to press my nose to smell it..<br />
The longevity is not even that bad but the projection is completely inexistant, if you want to smell it you need to be less than 5 cm away from the spray patch. <br />
And I can’t imagine buying such a beautiful perfume with keeping this frustration of not smelling myself :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1436225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1436225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1525632" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SailorV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.955817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SailorV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1525632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1525632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817">SailorV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-18">03/18/22 07:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A stunning grown-up caramel gourmand dream! It actually smells so well-blended that the notes are hard to single out when you don't look at the list, it just smells so warm, spicy and beautiful. But when you read the notes it all makes sense: An ultra creamy, milky salt caramel note with absolutely no hints of the burnt, crunchy tones other caramels have, with cashmeran blended in to amp the creaminess further up. Vanilla adds even more coziness, but it doesn't turn cloying. The spicy notes of cardamom and pimento are a great choice. The cardamom is dry and warm and smells just like it does in Swedish pastries, while the pimento is really hot and spicy, especially in the opening. A little bit like a ginger note, but even more fiery. It's uncommon to get this sensation from perfumes and I love it. <br />
I don't really smell tobacco here though, instead I get some booziness in the opening and a slight woodsy vibe behind the spiced gourmand goodness. <br />
To me this is strictly a fall/winter scent. It's warming, cozy and sexy, feminine and sweet without being overly girly. <br />
<br />
Admittedly I ignored Penhaligons for a long time because the traditional "old English" image is a little bland to me, I just never found it appealing. If you think like this, please go out and try Constance (or whatever sounds good to you from the Portraits collection), they're not boring at all and very well-made.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1525632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1525632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="50256" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1394148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1394148" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beautscnt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beautscnt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1394148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1394148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371926">Beautscnt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-17">08/17/21 18:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my goodness! Talk about a DUD! <br />
Did the whole nighttime shower routine, moisturized with whipped butter &amp; jojoba oil. Then sprayed while skin was damp… did not last an hour! I even forgot I sprayed it on till I walked back to the dresser to apply perfume cause I thought I forgot to?! <br />
Had it been another perfume, I would be smelling it in bed till morning.<br />
<br />
Absolutely NOT worth the high mark-up. It really should be going for $15 at most (for the price of the bottle &amp; the headpiece cap but not for the juice) <br />
I’ve had $5 body sprays last longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1394148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1394148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1018126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1018126" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flaviano1978"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="flaviano1978" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Couvent-Maison-de-Parfum/Cologne-of-the-Missions-18811.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18811.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cologne of the Missions"title="Cologne of the Missions"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1018126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1018126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178614">flaviano1978</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-08">01/08/19 05:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another one of the samples I ordered from Penhaligon's. I was intrigued by the notes listed- I was imagining a sort of "Cherguiesque" scent with a pimento kick but the reality was disappointing. The opening was good but that was it. Not long after it morphs into Equinox Bloom. And just like the antelope Constance's longevity and sillage are also fleeting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1018126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1018126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent977736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc977736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sharon.ramsey.900"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/301687"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.301687.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sharon.ramsey.900" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Merchant-of-Venice/Queen-of-The-Night-83803.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83803.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Queen of The Night"title="Queen of The Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma977736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd977736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/301687">sharon.ramsey.900</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-01">09/01/18 16:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not at all impressed with this. A very meh forgetabble scent and certainly not worth the pricetag .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="977736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=977736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135667" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sukipickles"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1905281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sukipickles" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905281">Sukipickles</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 02:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts and remains sugary. The opening contains a tiny spike of heat and wood, but settles rapidly into general sugariness. At that price point, not justified.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="2135667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=2135667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1641622" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="prudenceliquorice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="prudenceliquorice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Gaultier-Divine-83889.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83889.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gaultier Divine"title="Gaultier Divine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1641622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1641622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204355">prudenceliquorice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-09">09/09/22 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so excited to finally own a Penhaligons perfume, but this disappeared so quickly that I decided to return it, heart-broken. <br />
So disappointing - I usually get comments on my perfume, but no one could smell this on me. If they do a revamped version, which lasts for half an hour or more, let me know</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="50256"comment_id="1641622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Changing-Constance-50256.html?ccid=1641622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="50256" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title=" Roja Dove Tea at BG It truly is fantastic. I&#039;d consider this a safe scent with year-round versatility. ">by
            <em>Aarongunarich17</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1242332.jpg"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">

        <a href="/news/New-From-Day-Three-Aylan-21566.html#cc275766"><span class="link-span"></span>

        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
